content: We're going to need more lithium ,https://,bloom.bg/2q2hU8h, ,pic.twitter.com/LuFIJzQyQf
Vast amounts of Lithium metal in the world.  Not rare nor expensive to produce.  Just needs demand to spur new mines. ,#,ignorethehype

There's billions of barrels of oil in the world - not to mention trillions of cubic feet of gas...but getting to it kinda winds folks up; can't imagine the environmentalists will be particularly happy with that spur in new mines...just shifts the issue from oil to lithium.
Lets invade Chile and China. (A Thornton Incident, WMD, a "Maine" blowup, Gulf of Tonkin. Any pretext is valid. Lets go!)
So are electric cars actually more sustainable?
Don’t let the Chinese get all of it :-)
